text: seagate, kai poli kalos kai o WD, me kales thermokrasies
sto seti ginetai automata... fantzomai kai sto karkinoprogramma

Agorasa mia RADEON 8500 kai exi TV-OUT ... bebea to tv out einai ena bisma pou lei S-VIDEO To bisma einai strogilo arseniko kai einai 7 pin. Bebea to kouti eixe ena kalodio pou exi gia auto malon bisma thiliko ..... alla kai apo tis 2 pleures einai to idio. Opws katalabenete to prob einai ean auto to bisma ginete kapos omoaksoniko apo tin mia pleura tou gia na sindethi me tin tv. Ean iksere kaneis tha ithela na mou pi ti na kanw .... thanx.

apofasisa loipon na to agoraso. aurio tha kano tin paraggelia. opos eipa tha agoraso ton 24ari me 500ari skliro ton 2.8extreme kai 2gb ram. thelo na kano mia erotisi i opoia borei se pio sxetikous me mac(kathoti ego eimai newbie) na fanei asteia alla ego ofeilo na tin kano. den pisteuo na argoun ta leopard se auton ton imac? mipos xreiazeta perisotero mnimi? euxaristo
dokimase episis na baleis ton enan disko pano kai oxi kai tous 2 an ine ide kai oi 2. an ine sata kai ide tote prosexe kai sto bios

kalimera lipon tha kaneis backup opos soy eipan ta paidia me to norton gost h tha graceis oti simantiko exeis se cd prin kaneis otidipote prota tha alaxeis to trofodotiko exapantos bale ena 400 tha katebaseis apo to site tis western digital to life gard einai ena programataki gia elenxo toy hard meta repair xana ta windows kai meta scan disk sxolastiko ston skliro kai h esxati lisi format kai kainoyrgia egkatastasi toy leitoyrgikoy

Me ton kainourio skliro logika sou ksanaperase ta Windows. Pithanotata na min sou perase to SP2 to opoio exei engeni upostiriksi gia USB 2.0 (exei diladi enswmatwmeno ton driver) kai sunepws ta Windows XP vlepoun tis thires sou san usb 1.0 Dokimase na peraseis to SP2 kai logika ta provlimata tha luthoyn. An twra sto exei perasei den mou erxetai kati allo. Gia na deis an exeis to SP2 patas deksi klik sto My Computer kai ekei poy soy leei version twn Windows sou leei an exeis h oxi to SP2.

Re seis min xefeugei i sizitisi! EGw antipa8ousa ta princo giati stin epoxi tw n8x xwris burnproof otan ekana eggrafi etrema! K eixe bgei to onoma princo(tromos)(yamaha atapi 8x) Apo tin stigmi pou bgike to burnproof ta dedomena allaxan! AKoma kai cd xeirotetis poiotitas kaneis tin douleia sou!

Pare epwnymo trofodotiko, estw kai 300w, mporei na se swsei apo polla!! 8a sou proteina na pareis to ANTEC SMARTPOWER 350watt! Exei liges meres pou to phra kai pistevw oti htan mia poly kalh epilogh! Mono 80 eurw, 3 xronia egiisi ta xarakthristika tou ksepernane xalara ena noname 450 watt!!!! Gia tou logou to alithes sou lew oti exei 3,3v kai 5v combined 230watt(oi grammes autes dhl oi 3,3 kai h 5 einai oi shmantikoteres pou prepei na koitas se ena trofodotiko, eidika se platformes Athlon) se anti8esh me kapoio noname 350 watt pou 8a dwsei to poly 180-190 watt! Exei PFC(power factor correction) kati pou dyskola 8a vreis se noname PSU kai systhma diakophs leitourgias se periptwsh yperfwrtwshs!! Gia thn psixi tou yparxoun 2 anemisthres enas 80mm kai enas 92mm pou rithmizoun tis strofes analoga me thn 8ermokrasia! Sto proteinw an psaxneis gia ena poly kalo trofodotiko sta 350watt, pou den kaigetai eukola!! An h tseph sou antexei vevea pare to TRUEPOWER 380 watt, oti kalytero, symfwna me metrhseis vgazei alithina 471 watt!!!! tsekare autes tis dieu8ynseis: , kai Filika
e???? pou to eides oti einai miso?

Na kai to diko mou pcaki... oli i moda exei pesei pano sto watercooling kai oxi sto kouti "thermaltake armor" (tha erthei sintoma kai i ora tou)... liga logia gia to watercooling... apotelite apo mono psigio 120mm, antlia eheim 1250, zalman cpu waterblock, alphacool dfi-sli chipset waterblock, alphacool vga waterblock kai water tank eleven... to sistima xrisimopiei rakor kai solines 1/2" kai 3/8"... afta... sti sinexia photos kai apo tis modes tou koutiou... 1. 2. 3.
bale sp2 kai stou filou sou kai tha eisai entaksei.
